table_description: Details about roles in the Google Workspace system, including privileges and system settings.

columns.name: roleId
columns.description: The unique identifier of the role.

columns.name: roleDescription
columns.description: A description of what the role entails.

columns.name: isSystemRole
columns.description: Indicates if the role is a system role.

columns.name: isSuperAdminRole
columns.description: Indicates if the role is a super admin role.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The type of role (e.g., system, custom).

columns.name: etag
columns.description: The etag identifier for the resource.

columns.name: rolePrivileges
columns.description: List of privileges associated with the role.
